ProcessTemplates.Name: Json file to MS SQL Database Update
ProcessTemplates.Description:
This process will retrieve a **Json file** from the specified **SFTP** server.
It will take the contents of the file and use it to  create an **MS SQL Database** update statement. It will then execute the statement on the specified **MS SQL Database**.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"FilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path to input Json file"},"FileName":{"Value":"\"Rates.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of input Json file"},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"staeasycrmprod.blob.core.windows.net\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP Server address"},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"staeasycrmprod.exampleuser\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP Server User"},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"QSdUb/8TEREN9E8zMorDQd9QqyKJ9kIv\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP Server User's Password"},"TableName":{"Value":"\"[Demo].[ExchangeRates]\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of table to be updated"},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"Server=frends-dev-sql.database.windows.net;Database=FRENDS Demo;User Id=FRENDSDemo;Password=KDaa342SD1!!0kd;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Database connection string"}}

Process.Name: Json file to MS SQL Database Update
Process.Description:
This process will retrieve a **Json file** from the specified **SFTP** server.
It will take the contents of the file and use it to  create an **MS SQL Database** update statement. It will then execute the statement on the specified **MS SQL Database**.
